name: Lucid Dream - GMTK 2020
description:
Controls
PC:
A - left
D - right
W - climb
Space - jump
Escape - pause

Xbox Controller:
Left Analog stick - left, right and climb
A - jump
Start - pause

Description
You've been sleeping for a long time. You've awoken to find that most of your vital components are missing; without them, you're unable to control your body! You must retrieve the components and escape the desert!

Thanks for playing my submission to the GMTK game jam 2020!
